layout.title: User settings
layout.subtitle: Manage your profile, interface preferences, and notifications.
layout.loginRequired: You need to be logged in to manage your profile.

guildLayout.title: Guild settings
guildLayout.subtitle: Manage workspace membership and guild details.
guildLayout.permissionDenied: You need additional permissions to view this page.

adminLayout.title: Platform settings
adminLayout.subtitle: Manage authentication, branding, SMTP, and users for the entire platform.

profile.subtitle: Keep your account details up to date.
profile.cardDescription: Update your name, password, and avatar.

security.devicesDescription: Mobile devices that are currently logged in to your account. Revoking access will log the device out.
security.noDevicesHint: When you log in from a mobile device, it will appear here.
security.revokeDialogDescription: This will log out {{deviceName}}. They will need to log in again to access your account.
security.newKeyDescription: Copy this key now. You will not be able to view it again.
security.generateDescription: Create long-lived credentials for scripts or integrations.
security.expirationHelp: Leave blank for a key that never expires.
security.existingDescription: Only the last few characters are shown. Rotate keys regularly.

ai.title: AI Configuration
ai.managedByAdmin: AI settings are managed by your administrator.
ai.managedByPlatform: AI settings are managed at the platform level.
ai.adminDisabledUser: Your administrator has disabled user-level AI configuration. AI features are using {{source}} settings.
ai.adminDisabledGuild: The platform administrator has disabled guild-level AI configuration. AI features are using platform settings.
ai.usePlatformSettingsDescription: Inherit AI configuration from platform defaults.
ai.enableAIGuildDescription: Allow AI-powered features for this guild.
ai.enableAIPlatformDescription: Allow AI-powered features across the platform.
ai.apiKeyHelpExisting: Leave blank to keep your existing key.
ai.apiKeyHelpExistingShort: Leave blank to keep the existing key.
ai.apiKeyHelpNew: Enter your personal API key for this provider.
ai.apiKeyHelpNewShort: Enter your API key for this provider.
ai.allowUserOverrideDescription: Let users in this guild configure their own AI settings.
ai.allowGuildOverrideDescription: Let guild administrators configure their own AI settings.
ai.allowUserOverridePlatformDescription: Let users configure their own AI settings (BYOK).
ai.adminOnlyGuild: Only guild administrators can manage AI settings.
ai.adminOnlyPlatform: Only platform admins can manage platform AI settings.
ai.description: Configure your personal AI settings. You can use {{source}} defaults or bring your own API key (BYOK).

guildAI.title: Guild AI Configuration
guildAI.description: Configure AI settings for this guild. You can use platform defaults or set custom configuration.

platformAI.description: Configure AI provider settings for the platform. Users can bring their own API keys if allowed.

interface.title: Interface settings
interface.colorThemeDescription: Choose a color theme for the application.
interface.weekStartsOnDescription: Choose which day to show first on calendars and date pickers.
interface.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the interface.

notifications.title: Notification settings
notifications.description: Control which notifications you receive by channel. Bell notifications always appear regardless of these settings.
notifications.pushDescription: Receive real-time alerts on your device
notifications.pushBlockedDescription: To enable push notifications, open your device settings, find this app, and enable notifications.
notifications.overdueTimeHelp: Daily reminder time (uses the timezone above).

categories.initiativeInvitesDescription: When you’re added to a new initiative.
categories.taskAssignmentsDescription: Hourly summary when others assign you tasks.
categories.mentionsDescription: When someone mentions you or comments on your work.
categories.newProjectDescription: When projects are created in your initiatives.
categories.overdueTasksDescription: Daily reminder for tasks past due at your scheduled time.

dangerZone.disconnectDescription: Log out and disconnect from this server. You can connect to a different server afterward.
dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.subtitle: Irreversible and destructive actions for your account.
dangerZone.deleteDescription: Permanently delete your account or deactivate it temporarily. This action affects your projects, documents, and other content.
dangerZone.deactivateDescription: Temporarily disable your account. You won't be able to log in, but all your data will be preserved. An administrator can reactivate your account later.
dangerZone.permanentDeleteDescription: Completely remove your account from the system. Projects will be transferred to other users. Comments and documents will remain but show "[Deleted User]". This cannot be undone.
dangerZone.permanentDeleteDescriptionText: Completely remove your account from the system. Projects will be transferred to other users. Comments and documents will remain but show "[Deleted User]".

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.eligibilityError: Unable to check account deletion eligibility.
deleteAccount.softDeleteDescription: Your account will be deactivated. You won't be able to log in, but your data will be preserved. An administrator can reactivate your account.
deleteAccount.hardDeleteDescription: Your account will be permanently deleted. Your projects must be transferred to other members. Comments will show "[Deleted User]".
deleteAccount.blockersDescription: The following issues must be resolved before you can delete your account:
deleteAccount.lastAdminGuilds: You are the last admin in these guilds. You must promote another member or leave before deleting.
deleteAccount.transferDescription: You own the following projects. Choose a new owner for each:
deleteAccount.confirmDescription: This action is irreversible. Enter your password and type DELETE MY ACCOUNT to confirm.
deleteAccount.chooseTypeDescription: Choose how you want to delete your account
deleteAccount.checkBlockersDescription: Checking if your account can be deleted
deleteAccount.softDeleteRadioDescription: You cannot log in, but all data is preserved. An administrator can reactivate your account later.
deleteAccount.hardDeleteRadioDescription: Most data will be removed from the system. Comments and documents will be kept but labeled as "[Deleted User]". This action cannot be undone.
deleteAccount.resolveIssues: Please resolve these issues before deleting your account.
deleteAccount.eligible: Your account is eligible for deletion.
deleteAccount.selectNewOwners: Select new owners for your projects before proceeding with account deletion.
deleteAccount.softConfirmDescription: Your account will be deactivated. You will not be able to log in, but all your data will be preserved. An administrator can reactivate your account.
deleteAccount.hardConfirmDescription: Your account will be permanently deleted. Your projects will be transferred. Comments and documents will remain but will show "[Deleted User]" as the author. This action cannot be undone.
deleteAccount.agreeConsequences: I understand this action cannot be undone

branding.adminOnly: Only platform admins can manage branding settings.
branding.colorsDescription: Customize the accent colors for light and dark mode.
branding.lightModeHelp: Buttons, highlights, and focus states use this color while the app is in light mode.
branding.darkModeHelp: Accent and primary elements use this color while dark mode is active.
branding.rolesDescription: Customize how each project role is described throughout the workspace.
branding.adminHelper: Shown anywhere the admin role appears.
branding.projectManagerHelper: Used for the project_manager role (e.g. “Team lead”).

email.adminOnly: Only platform admins can manage email settings.
email.title: SMTP email
email.description: Configure the SMTP server used for transactional emails.
email.secureHelp: Enable for port 465. Keep disabled for ports 587 or 25 (uses STARTTLS when available).
email.rejectUnauthorizedHelp: Disable only if you fully trust the mail server and understand the risk.
email.passwordHelp: Leave blank to keep the existing password.

auth.adminOnly: Only platform admins can manage authentication settings.
auth.title: OIDC authentication
auth.description: Configure single sign-on for your workspace.
auth.enabledHelp: Allow users to authenticate via your OIDC provider.
auth.clientSecretHelp: Leave blank to keep the existing secret.
auth.mappingsDescription: Map claim values from your identity provider to guild and initiative memberships.
auth.claimPathCardDescription: Dot-notation path to the claim array in the OIDC token. Common paths:
auth.claimPathHelp: The dot-separated path to the claim in the ID token. Leave blank if not needed.
auth.rulesDescription: Map OIDC claim values to guild and initiative memberships.
auth.noMappings: No mappings configured. Add a mapping to automatically assign users to guilds and initiatives when they sign in via OIDC.
auth.mappingDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this mapping?

platformUsers.title: Platform users
platformUsers.description: Manage all users across the platform.
platformUsers.promoteDescription: This will give {{email}} platform admin permissions, allowing them to manage platform settings, users, and configurations.
platformUsers.demoteDescription: This will remove platform admin permissions from {{email}}. They will no longer be able to access platform settings.
platformUsers.resetDescription: This will send a password reset email to {{email}}.
platformUsers.cannotDemoteLastAdmin: Cannot demote the last platform admin

adminDeleteUser.title: Delete User
adminDeleteUser.subtitle: Delete {{email}}
adminDeleteUser.softDeleteDescription: The user will be deactivated. They won't be able to log in, but their data will be preserved. You can reactivate their account later.
adminDeleteUser.hardDeleteDescription: The user will be permanently deleted. Their projects must be transferred. Comments will show "[Deleted User]".
adminDeleteUser.blockersDescription: The following issues must be resolved before this user can be deleted:
adminDeleteUser.initiativeBlockerDescription: Promote another member to project manager:
adminDeleteUser.deleteGuildConfirm: Delete guild "{{guildName}}"? This will permanently delete all guild data.
adminDeleteUser.transferDescription: This user owns the following projects. Choose a new owner for each:
